summary: WHILE DRIVING DOWN THE HIGHWAY, A FIRE BROKE OUT ON OUR 2003 5TH WHEEL RV.  IT WAS EXTINGUISHED QUICKLY BUT DESTROYED THE REFRIGERATOR AND DAMAGED THE CABINET NEXT TO IT.  THERE WAS SMOKE DAMAGE AND SOME WATER DAMAGE AS WELL.  THE REFRIGERATOR WAS ON LP MODE AS INSTRUCTED BY THE DEALER.*JB
